cb.lore.iron_scaffolding: Temporary block used for getting to the hard to reach places!
cb.lore.iron_scaffolding.use-open-hand: On block side - Teleport to the top. On block top - Teleport to bottom.
cb.lore.pencil: Places Blueprint. Blueprint can be used for mass building!
cb.lore.brush.1: Creates shapes of blueprint for all your building needs!
unit.blueprint.name: Blueprint
unit.blueprint.msg.error.notenough: You don't have enough blocks of that type!
unit.brush.name: Brush
unit.brush.msg.help-line.5: /cbrush fill <color> (hollow) - Creates a cube of Blueprint.
unit.brush.msg.help-line.6: /cbrush recolor <color1> <color2> - Recolors Blueprints of the first color with the second.
unit.brush.msg.help-line.8: /cbrush circle <color> (hollow) - Creates a circle of Blueprint.
unit.brush.msg.help-line.9: /cbrush cylinder <color> (hollow) - Creates a cylinder of Blueprint.
unit.brush.msg.help-line.10: /cbrush sphere <color> (hollow) - Creates a sphere of Blueprint.
unit.brush.msg.help-line.11: /cbrush pyramid <color> (hollow) - Creates a pyramid of Blueprint.
unit.brush.msg.error.disabled: The Brush is disabled by config!
unit.brush.msg.error.too-much-fill.over: You are %s Blocks over the max amount!
unit.brush.msg.error.held: A Brush needs to be held!
unit.brush.msg.error.walls: Both positions need to line up either on the x-axis or z-axis!
unit.brush.msg.error.pyramid: Both positions need to line up either on the x-axis, y-axis or z-axis!
unit.brush.msg.error.null-pos: Both of the Brush's positions need to be set!
cb.gui.pencil.name: Choose a Color
